data.name: Maze'Em
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game



Maze'Em is a top down game about an ever-changing maze.
Take control of your own character and be the first to conquer the maze!

Challenge Mode!

Test your maze-solving skills in a single player experience.
Unlock and complete new levels to progress through the world of Maze'Em.

Multiplayer Mode!

Gather some friends or play against strangers in a - up to 4 player - multiplayer experience! Move the maze to your advantage or cut off the path for your opponent, locking him in place! The first player that collects all his items wins the game!


Meet the cast!

Pick your own character for a personalized experience!

An Ever-changing Maze

Modify the game rules to your own liking, change the number of maze pieces, maze type and even the number of items you need to collect. Creating the perfect game for you liking. Every maze you encounter will be different from the last one, or pick one of your favorite seeds to play on.

data.short_description: Maze'Em is an a-maze-ing game where you face off against other players in an ever-changing maze or where you can test your own maze-solving skills during challenge mode!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3200g or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 560 (2GB)/AMD Radeon 7850 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770/AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 980 (4GB)/AMD R9 380 (4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
